title: Make Netflix Free?, Dr. Oz NOT Smart? 4.23.20
itunes:title: Make Netflix Free?, Dr. Oz NOT Smart? 4.23.20
description:
In episode 615, Jack, Miles, and Jamie are joined by comedian Guy Montgomery from New Zealand to discuss all the misinformation being spread about coronavirus, the 'miracle' drug Hydroxychloroquine, seniors getting grumpy with Trump, Netflix subscriptions going up due to the pandemic, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Chinese Agents Spread Messages That Sowed Virus Panic in U.S., Officials Say
  2. U.S. Adversaries Are Accelerating, Coordinating Coronavirus Disinformation, Report Says
  3. Why Bill Gates is the focus of the latest coronavirus conspiracy theories
  4. Trump and Fox News Are Suddenly Silent on Their “Miracle” Drug Hydroxychloroquine
  5. On Fox & Friends, Dr. Oz suggests that hydroxychloroquine isn't more widely embraced because people hate Trump: "If it had never been brought up at a White House briefing, this medication, would people still feel the same way about it?"
  6. Dr. Oz, on Fox & Friends, says the VA study on hydroxychloroquine shows that "we don't know" if it works and "we are better off waiting for the randomized trials Dr. Fauci has been asking for."
  7. 'It's Fine If You Die' Miiiight Not Be Best Trump Campaign Slogan
  8. Netflix Adds 15 Million Subscribers Amid Coronavirus, ‘Tiger King’ Boom; Warns of Downturn in Future
  9. Free Netflix: Petition asks streamers to stop charging due to coronavirus
  10. WATCH: Elkin & Nelson - Jibaro

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
